name: Centiplode (Classic Centipede Shooter)
description:
Angry centipedes are coming down the screen in retro pixels style to attack your hero! But you are well armed and able to defend yourself and your Garden from the coming killer bugs! Paid version of classic arcade game shooter with increasing difficulty and vibrant pixel art colors.

Insert Coin and make Centiplode one of the best paid centipede games!

One of the first original arcade games for girls and great for the whole family to play!

Player scores by shooting colorful centipede sections, turning them into mushrooms!
Special bonuses for Fleas and the deadly Poisonous Scorpions!

Centipede head = 100 points , body = 10 , Flea = 200 , Spider = 300 to 900 , Scorpion = 1000

A new classic arcade game for mobile but with some modern touches to add extra game-feel and 2 control options (1 or 2 fingers mode). Based on 80's arcade games.

1-Finger Mode = Drag to move and Auto Shoot
2-Finger Mode = Drag to move and Tap top of screen to shoot

Drag / touch Controls allow a responsive alternative to the original trackball controls

★ No Ads
★ Heart-racing arcade fun and challenging gameplay
★ Screen Shaking Effects (optional)
★ Retro color pixel art and chip sounds
★ 1 or 2 Finger control drag modes
★ Bonus lives based of scoring
★ Easy to Play But Harder to Master

Additional Updates
================
- Mushroom Maze Bonus Levels
- More angry baddies to run from
- More action in retro pixels!!
- More explosions too
